ygData.subject: Re: Veratis
ygData.msgSnippet: Veratis stepped forward placing a hand on her fur. He heard her speak so he knew her transformation was successfull. She stood taller than him in her bear

Veratis stepped forward placing a hand on her fur. He heard her speak 
so he knew her transformation was successfull. She stood taller than 
him in her bear mode. he placed his hands on her wings, by all logic 
they shouldn't have existed. somehow her memories triggered this 
change. He scanned her entire body, it was healthy whatever she was.

"I don't know what you did to change the dna sequencing but somehow 
your owl form showed up." His mind was filled with a thousand 
questions but he couldn't bring himself to ask them all. "Just rest 
for now and when you're 100 percent we'll go outside and try out your 
new form."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Shadow Wing::
> She looked down and sighed heavily.  She missed him a lot and 
wished 
> to see him again. Then again, he may not recongnize her in her new 
> form. She wondered if he would still be happy to see her in her new 
> form. She looked at Veratis. "Yes, I understand. What am I supposed 
> to do now? I'm not fully complete yet.  This form is still 
changing. 
> and I don't know..." she stopped and doubled over as she clutched 
at 
> her stomach.  Her internal circuits were in the last stages of 
> generation.  She held onto the table for suport. She fell to her 
> knees nd transformed into beast mode. The form was in finally 
stages 
> of completetion.  Normall a bot is asleep through this and doesn't 
> experience pain, but she was wide awake and going through the 
ordeal. 
> She transformed into polar bear with the owl wings protruding from 
> her shoulder blades. Her hands transformed into massive paws with 
> huge claws.  Her white fur now covered her completely and her eyes 
> were a pearcing bright blue. Her sence of smell and hearing was 
> greatly increased and she roared out a bear roar as she finished 
her 
> change.  She stood in beast mode and looked at Vertis. Her wings 
> extended over her and her bear head up. She said in a shocked 
> voice, "By the matrix...." 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > "You can't reach him because your link was broken when I removed 
> your spark
> > from his old body." he figured that was a logical assumption to 
> tell her.
> > "Now you will just have to stop worrying about him for a while 
and 
> start
> > thinking about yourself. You have a very unexpected form and will 
> need time
> > to adjust. Lunarpine is a bigbot that can take care of himself."
> > 
> > Veratis studied the readings he'd been taking the whole time she 
was
> > forming. He set down the results he'd found, turned to her looked 
> her
> > directly in the eyes. "Lunarpine promised he'd return for you. I 
> think he'd
> > crawl on his belly if he had to. Any bot who'd risk his own 
> existence to
> > carry two sparks isn't one to give up easily. He'll be back."
